biotools.summary: scNET is a tool for evaluating the reproducibility of single-cell gene regulatory network inference algorithms. Here three single-cell network inference algorithms is benchamrk based on their reproducibility, i.e. their ability to infer similar networks once applied to two independent datasets from the same biological condition.
